text:
Massimiliano Neri (born 14 June 1977, in Naples, Italy) is an Italian model and media personality.
Career.
Neri entered the modeling industry as a professional in Milan in 1995. He has participated in events with the following designers Versace, Dolce & Gabbana, Iceberg and Levi Strauss & Co, in Milan, Sydney, Auckland, Tokyo, Miami, New York. In New Zealand he was given a place in TV commercial for Levi's.
he also made a TV commercial for Versace's sunglasses, which was shown in all over Europe.
